articles.description: Tiger Woods is back, and with him, his fist pumps, his massive galleries of thousands of fans and, of course, his occasional expletive. The PGA legend was caught cursing in Augusta on Thursday.
articles.content:
Tiger Woods is back, and with him, his patented fist pump, his massive galleries of thousands of fans and, of course, his occasional expletive.
